service.description: Configuration properties for the jupyter-datascience service for DC/OS.

cpus.description: CPU shares to allocate to this marathon instance.

mem.description: Memory (in MB) to allocate to this marathon instance.

networking.description: Networking-related configuration properties for RStudio on DC/OS.

virtual-host.description: The virtual host address to configure for integration with Marathon-lb.

https-redirect.description: Whether Marathon-lb should redirect HTTP traffic to HTTPS. This requires 'virtual-host' to be set. By default, this is false.
